data.message: i love u M! i love your music nd i love your mind! its sooo crazy that it seems so right! i love everything that has ever came out your mouth! everytime im depressed nd feel completly alone i listen to u nd d only u nd some how i feel like someone out there has gone thro the same fucked up shit as me and i dont feel so alone aanymore....so thankyou i fuckin love u....u should totally write me it would mean the world to me!!!u
